data.description:
Step into the lush, untamed world of Monke Bash, where the thrill of the jungle comes alive in virtual reality! Inspired by the wildly popular Gorilla Tag, this fangame puts a unique spin on the exhilarating concept, offering players an immersive and action-packed experience like never before.

As you don the VR headset and enter the vibrant jungle environment of Monke Bash, you'll find yourself transformed into a mighty primate, ready to swing, leap, and bash your way to victory. The game seamlessly blends intuitive controls with heart-pounding gameplay, ensuring that players of all skill levels can dive right into the action.

Whether you're navigating dense foliage, scaling towering trees, or engaging in intense acrobatic showdowns with fellow players, every moment in Monke Bash is a pulse-pounding adventure. With each swing of your virtual arms, you'll feel the rush of adrenaline as you outmaneuver your opponents and claim your rightful place as the alpha of the jungle.

But Monke Bash isn't just about raw strength and agilityâ€”it's also about strategy and cunning. As you explore the jungle landscape, you'll need to use all of your wits to outsmart your opponents, setting traps, devising ambushes, and staying one step ahead at all times.

changelog.change_log: Fix getting outside the map bug and added lil gib walking round the map :D
fixed some bugs with the booster vents and some thing in shop
Fixed PVP and being able to get the PVP hammer out the PVP map
